addr: Bedford Square London, England WC1B 3JA GB
title: Gadgette and Virtual Umbrella present VR The Future
desc: Come and join us in central London for some of the most innovative, inspiring and ridiculously fun virtual reality demos out there.? From the suit that lets someone hug you from afar to the headset that lets you walk around in another universe, we've got so much exciting stuff for you to try. And of course, there'll be drinks and nibbles - because beer and goggles is an unbeatable combo. If you've never tried virtual reality before, prepare to be amazed. There'll be 10 types for you to try, including Oculus and HTC Vive.? Get in early and get your VR fix for less - early bird tickets are half price!  - the UK's biggest tech site for women - and  , the VR marketing specialists. , inspiring co-working in the heart of creative London.
